attributes.action: TO GET TRANSPARENCY IN OUR PUBLIC BODY AND STOP BIAS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WAS HORRIFIED TO READ THAT OUR SENIOR CIVIL SERVENTS ARE EXCEPTING WHAT MOST WOULD CALL A BACK HANDER,THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS A FREE LUNCH AND I HAVE FIRST HAND EXPERIANCE WITH BIAS IN WHAT SOME WOULD CALL CORRUPTION IS VISSIBLE IN MIDDLESBROUGH COUNCIL AND ALSO THE GOVERNMENT OMBUDSMAN. LETS PUT A STOP TO THE PEOPLE WORKING IN THE PUBLIC DOMAIN GETTING PERKS, LETS MAKE A LAW TO STOP IT, THE GOVERNMENT IS QUICK TO MAKE A LAW TO CONTROLL US THE PEOPLE BUT NOT THEMSELVES. LETS HAVE SOME TRANSPARENCY IN OUR PUBLIC BODIES AND STOP THE BIAS AND CORRUPTION WITH BACK-HANDERS AND DECISIONS THAT DONT MAKE SENSE BUT FOR THE FACT THAT THERE IS AN UNKNOWN WORD IN THE RIGHT EAR OR A TICKET TO THE RIGHT SHOW.

rejection.details: Please resubmit your petition using sentence case to make it more readable on the web.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
